title: Bad Image did all fixes, none worked...
body: I've done all you can think of... Delete the League Client, Reset my WHOLE computer, run as an admin for the installer and launcher and I still to this day have an issue, it gives me the .dll errors like libcurl.dll, libcrypto-1_1.dll and more. I need help, really a big disappointment with this client ever since the update. @Riot Help Me

replies.body:
Those dll errors aren't exactly an issue with the new client, as these problems occurred back then as well. What's really happening is that those files are now corrupted or just weren't ever installed properly, to begin with. 

[**Follow these steps exactly **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040)to make sure League is completely uninstalled with no traces left. Then, reinstall League using [**this link**](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload), and make sure you run the installer as Admin while firewalls are disabled.
We're a go boys! Thank you so much! I love the response time.
How do I disable firrwalls? So confused...
Control Panel\System and Security\Windows Firewall\Customize Settings
